text: The 2018 SMP F4 Championship was the fourth season of the SMP F4 Championship. The series is also known as FIA North-European Zone (NEZ) championship. Koiranen GP, despite of creating Formula Academy Finland, continues as the promoter.F4 NEZ CHAMPIONSHIP certified by FIA SPORTING REGULATIONS 2018 Art.8, page 4 The season started in Smolensk Ring on 5 May and finished in Assen Circuit on 21 October. Champion Konsta Lappalainen wins 7 races, as runner-up Mikhael Belov take 5 race wins, as Isac Blomqvist take 3 victories. Amaury Cordeel and Ivan Berets take 2 podiums on top, Tuomas Happalainen and Pavel Bulantsev take 1 race win. Russian won 2nd race on NRING Circuit, as Finnish driver wins in 2nd race on Ahvenisto Race Circuit. ==Drivers== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" |- ! Team ! ! Driver ! For the first time of the existence of the championship Sochi Autodrom hadn't get a slot in the schedule. Circuit Zandvoort was swapped by Assen Circuit. While Autodrom Moscow and NRING Circuit were included into the calendar for the first time. Round 6 was originally scheduled to be held at Auto24ring on 15–16 September, but was rescheduled to take place at Alastaro Circuit on 22–23 September. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%" !colspan=2| Round !
